Bright Funds | Anywhere/Remote/Onsite | San Francisco, CA

Bright Funds is looking for a web developer to join our growing team of innovators, thinkers and world changers working to transform the charitable giving landscape through corporate workplace giving programs and beyond.

Since launching in 2012, we’ve partnered with some of the world’s most innovative startups and global corporations to offer Bright Funds’ charitable giving platform to employees around the world.

More Info: https://www.brightfunds.org/jobs
